 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁם‎</span> **adverb** ==there, thither== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***there***, compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***then***; Biblical Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תַּמָּה‎</span>, Egyptian Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תמה‎</span> [[BDB#S-C|S-C]]<sup>Pap. A 4, J 6</sup>, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּמָּן‎</span> (with demonstrative ***n***, compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱדַיִן‎</span> beside <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲזַי‎</span>), Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Zenj<sup>Had. 8</sup> ([[BDB#Cooke|Cooke]]<sup>159</sup>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שם‎</span>); — 

**1. a.** ***there*** [[Gen.2.8|Gen 2:8]]; [[Gen.2.12|Gen 2:12]]; [[Gen.11.2|Gen 11:2]]; [[Gen.11.7|Gen 11:7]]; [[Gen.11.31|Gen 11:31]] + often; placed early in sentence for emphasis, [[Mic.4.10|Mic 4:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁם תִּנָּצֵ֑לִי‎</span>, [[Nah.3.15|Nah 3:15]]; [[Ezek.32.22|Ezek 32:22]]; [[Ezek.32.24|Ezek 32:24]]; [[Ps.104.26|Ps 104:26]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשָׁם ֗֗֗ ‎</span> [[Gen.41.12|Gen 41:12]]; [[Exod.15.27|Exod 15:27]]; [[Num.13.22|Num 13:22]]; [[Num.13.33|Num 13:33]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁם ֗֗֗ וְשָׁם‎</span> [[Exod.15.25|Exod 15:25]]; [[Deut.12.14|Deut 12:14]]; [[Isa.27.10|Isa 27:10]]; [[Job.3.17|Job 3:17]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִנֵּה שָׁם ֗֗֗ ‎</span> [[Gen.29.2|Gen 29:2]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּי שָׁם ֗֗֗ ‎</span> [[Gen.11.9|Gen 11:9]]; [[Gen.21.31|Gen 21:31]]; [[Gen.35.7|Gen 35:7]]; [[2Sam.1.21|2Sam 1:21]]; [[2Sam.15.21|2Sam 15:21]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַךְ שָׁם ֗֗֗ ‎</span> [[Isa.34.14|Isa 34:14]]; [[Isa.34.15|Isa 34:15]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גַּם שָׁם ֗֗֗ ‎</span> [[Isa.23.12|Isa 23:12]]; [[Isa.57.7|Isa 57:7]]; [[Ps.139.10|Ps 139:10]] resuming a preceding 'where,' [[Job.39.30|Job 39:30]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּאֲשֶׁר חֲלָלִים שָׁם הוּא‎</span>, [[Judg.5.27|Judg 5:27]]; [[Jer.22.12|Jer 22:12]]; [[Eccl.11.3|Eccl 11:3]], compare [[Eccl.1.7|Eccl 1:7]]. Repeated, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁם ֗֗֗ שָׁם‎</span> ***here*** ... ***there*** [[Isa.28.10|Isa 28:10]]; [[Isa.28.13|Isa 28:13]]. In poetry, pointing to a spot in which a scene is localized vividly in the imagination, [[Ps.14.5|Ps 14:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁם פחדו פחד‎</span> ***there*** feared they a fear! [[Ps.36.13|Ps 36:13]], compare [[Ps.48.7|Ps 48:7]]; [[Ps.66.6|Ps 66:6]]; [[Ps.132.17|Ps 132:17]]; [[Hos.6.7|Hos 6:7]]; [[Zeph.1.14|Zeph 1:14]]. — [[Hab.3.4|Hab 3:4]] read probably ([[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]]) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂם‎</span> the flashes at his side ***made he*** the hiding of his power; [[Eccl.3.17|Eccl 3:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁם‎</span> = ***with God***, in the Divine plan or scheme: but read perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂם‎</span> [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#De|De]] and others 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** preceded by the rel., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲשֶׁר שָׁם‎</span> ***where***, [[Gen.2.11|Gen 2:11]]; [[Exod.20.21|Exod 20:21]]; [[1Sam.9.10|1Sam 9:10]] +, usually with one or more words between, [[Gen.13.3|Gen 13:3]]; [[Gen.13.14|Gen 13:14]]; [[Gen.19.27|Gen 19:27]]; [[Exod.29.42|Exod 29:42]]; [[2Sam.11.16|2Sam 11:16]]; [[2Kgs.23.27|2Kgs 23:27]] + often; after <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּאֲשֶׁר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּאֲשֶׁר הוּא שָׁם‎</span> [[Gen.21.17|Gen 21:17]]. With <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אשׁר‎</span> omitted (the relative being indicated by construct, [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:130c»§ 130 c, d</sup>) [[Ezek.39.11|Ezek 39:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְקוֺם שָׁם קֶבֶר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּיִשְׂר‎</span> a place ***where*** a grave (may be) in Israel, but [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[BDB#Co|Co]] [[BDB#Or|Or]] and others read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁם‎</span> a place of ***renown.*** 

**2.** ***thither***, after verbs of motion ( = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁ֫מָּה‎</span>, see **3**), [[Deut.1.37|Deut 1:37]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא תָבאֹ שָׁם‎</span>, [[Judg.19.15|Judg 19:15]]; [[Judg.21.10|Judg 21:10]]; [[1Sam.2.14|1Sam 2:14]]; [[1Sam.9.6|1Sam 9:6]] and elsewhere; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲשֶׁר ֗֗֗ שָׁם‎</span> ***whither***, [[1Kgs.18.10|1Kgs 18:10]]; [[1Kgs.21.18|1Kgs 21:18]]; [[2Kgs.1.4|2Kgs 1:4]]; [[2Kgs.1.6|2Kgs 1:6]]; [[2Kgs.1.16|2Kgs 1:16]]; [[Isa.20.6|Isa 20:6]], more often in Jeremiah, Ezekiel, as [[Jer.8.3|Jer 8:3]]; [[Jer.22.27|Jer 22:27]]; [[Jer.23.3|Jer 23:3]]; [[Jer.23.8|Jer 23:8]]; [[Jer.45.5|Jer 45:5]] +, [[Ezek.4.13|Ezek 4:13]]; [[Ezek.12.16|Ezek 12:16]]; [[Ezek.36.20|Ezek 36:20]]; [[Ezek.36.22|Ezek 36:22]] +; so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁשָּׁם‎</span> [[Ps.122.4|Ps 122:4]]. 

**3.** with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ה‎</span> locative, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁ֫מָּה‎</span> (<abbr title="transliteration"><u>sh¹mm¹h</u></abbr>): 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** after verbs of motion, ***thither***, [[Gen.19.20|Gen 19:20]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָנוּס שָׁ֫מָּה‎</span> to flee ***thither***, v[[Gen.19.22|Gen 19:22]]; [[Gen.20.13|Gen 20:13]]; [[Gen.24.6|Gen 24:6]]; [[Gen.29.3|Gen 29:3]]; [[Deut.1.38|Deut 1:38]] + often; = ***into it, therein*** (of a basket, pit, etc.), [[Exod.16.33|Exod 16:33]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְתֶןשָֿׁ֫מָּה מְלֹא הָעֹמֶר‎</span>, [[Exod.21.33|Exod 21:33]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנָפַל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמָּה‎</span>, [[Exod.30.18|Exod 30:18]]; [[Judg.8.25|Judg 8:25]]; [[2Kgs.12.10|2Kgs 12:10]] pregnantly, after a verb implying motion, as ***to bury***, [[Gen.23.13|Gen 23:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְאֶקְבְּרָה אֶתמֵֿתִי שָׁ֫מָּה‎</span>, [[Gen.25.10|Gen 25:10]]; [[Gen.49.31|Gen 49:31]]; [[Gen.50.5|Gen 50:5]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוֺעַד‎</span> ***to meet*** [[Exod.29.42|Exod 29:42]]; [[Exod.29.43|Exod 29:43]]; [[Exod.30.6|Exod 30:6]]; [[Exod.30.36|Exod 30:36]]; [[Num.17.19|Num 17:19]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]), [[Josh.2.16|Josh 2:16]]; [[Josh.7.3|Josh 7:3]]; [[Jer.13.7|Jer 13:7]]; [[Joel.4.7|Joel 4:7]], perhaps [[Song.8.5|Song 8:5]] (? **c**). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲשֶׁר ֗֗֗ שָׁ֫מָּה‎</span> ***whither*** [[Gen.20.13|Gen 20:13]]; [[Num.33.54|Num 33:54]]; [[Deut.4.5|Deut 4:5]]; [[Deut.4.14|Deut 4:14]] + often; ***where*** [[2Kgs.23.8|2Kgs 23:8]]; [[1Chr.4.41|1Chr 4:41]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** more rarely, i. q. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁם‎</span> ***there***, [[Gen.43.30|Gen 43:30]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֵּבְךְ שָׁ֫מָּה‎</span>, [[Josh.2.1|Josh 2:1]]; [[Judg.16.27|Judg 16:27]]; [[2Kgs.4.11|2Kgs 4:11]]; [[2Kgs.9.16|2Kgs 9:16]]; [[Hos.2.17|Hos 2:17]]; [[Isa.22.18|Isa 22:18]]; [[Isa.34.15|Isa 34:15]]; [[Isa.65.9|Isa 65:9]]; [[Jer.18.2|Jer 18:2]]; [[Jer.27.22|Jer 27:22]]; [[Ezek.23.3|Ezek 23:3]]; [[Ezek.32.29|Ezek 32:29]]; [[Ezek.32.30|Ezek 32:30]] ([[Ezek.32.22|Ezek 32:22]] v[[Ezek.32.24|Ezek 32:24]] v[[Ezek.32.26|Ezek 32:26]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁם‎</span>), [[Ezek.48.35|Ezek 48:35]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁ֫מָּה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, [[Ps.76.4|Ps 76:4]]; [[Ps.122.5|Ps 122:5]]; [[Eccl.3.16|Eccl 3:16]]. 

**4.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשָּׁם‎</span> ***from there, thence:*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** often after verbs of departing, taking, etc., [[Gen.2.10|Gen 2:10]]; [[Gen.11.8|Gen 11:8]]; [[Gen.11.9|Gen 11:9]]; [[Gen.12.8|Gen 12:8]]; [[Gen.18.16|Gen 18:16]]; [[Gen.24.7|Gen 24:7]]; [[Gen.42.2|Gen 42:2]], etc., [[Num.13.23|Num 13:23]]; [[Num.21.12|Num 21:12]]; [[Num.22.41|Num 22:41]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּרְא מִשָּׁם‎</span>, [[Deut.4.29|Deut 4:29]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּבִקַּשְׁתֶּם מִשָּׁם‎</span>, [[Deut.30.4|Deut 30:4]]; [[Jer.37.12|Jer 37:12]]; [[Hos.2.17|Hos 2:17]]; [[Amos.9.2|Amos 9:2]]; [[Amos.9.3|Amos 9:3]]; [[Amos.9.4|Amos 9:4]]; [[Job.39.29|Job 39:29]] +. Peculiarly, [[Gen.49.24|Gen 49:24]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשָּׁם רֹעֶה אֶבֶן יִשְׂר‎</span> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]] [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#RV|RVm]] ***from there*** [from heaven], (from) the Shepherd (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), the Stone (Rock) of Israel, [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Sta|Sta]] ***from there*** (where is) the Shepherd of (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹעֵה‎</span>) the (Bethel-)stone of Israel; but both forced: text dubious; [[BDB#Gunk|Gunk]] by the name (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשֵּׁם‎</span>; so [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]]) of the Shepherd, etc. (as [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Di|Di]]). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲשֶׁר ֗֗֗ מִשָּׁם‎</span> ***whence*** [[Gen.24.5|Gen 24:5]]; [[Num.23.13|Num 23:13]] +. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** expressing ***origin***, [[Gen.3.23|Gen 3:23]] the ground <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲשֶׁר לֻקַּח‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשָּׁם‎</span>, [[Gen.10.14|Gen 10:14]] ***whence*** (= ***from whom***) came forth the Philistines, [[Judg.19.18|Judg 19:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשָּׁם אָנֹכִי‎</span>, [[1Sam.10.12|1Sam 10:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִישׁ מִשָּׁם‎</span>, [[Isa.65.20|Isa 65:20]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** of the mass, ***from*** which something is taken or made, [[Gen.27.9|Gen 27:9]]; [[Gen.30.32|Gen 30:32]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צאֹן‎</span>), [[Lev.2.2|Lev 2:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְקָמַץ מִשָּׁם זגו‎</span> (from the meal, etc., of a <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מנחה‎</span>), [[1Kgs.17.13|1Kgs 17:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַךְ עֲשִׁי לִי מִשָּׁם עֻגָה קְטַנָּה‎</span> i.e. from the meal and oil, [[2Kgs.7.2|2Kgs 7:2]]; [[2Kgs.7.19|2Kgs 7:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמִשָּׁם לֹא תאֵֹכל׃‎</span>, [[Ezek.5.3|Ezek 5:3]].
